 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֻּתֹּ֫נֶת‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּתֹ֫נֶת‎</span> **noun feminine** ==tunic== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎כִּתּוּנָא‎</span>. etc., <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> etc.; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***tunic, linen***; compare also √ above); — absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֻּתֹּנֶת‎</span> [[Gen.37.31|Gen 37:31]] + 2 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּתֹנֶת‎</span> [[Exod.28.39|Exod 28:39]] construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּתֹנֶת‎</span> [[Gen.37.3|Gen 37:3]] + 9 t.; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֻּתָּנְתּוֺ‎</span> [[Gen.37.23|Gen 37:23]]; [[2Sam.15.32|2Sam 15:32]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֻּתָּנְתֶּ֑ךָ‎</span> [[Isa.22.21|Isa 22:21]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֻּתָּנְתִּי‎</span> [[Job.30.18|Job 30:18]]; [[Song.5.3|Song 5:3]] plural absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֻּתֳּנֹת‎</span> [[Exod.28.40|Exod 28:40]] + 3 t., <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַכָּתְנֹת‎</span> [[Exod.39.27|Exod 39:27]] construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּתְנוֺת‎</span> [[Gen.3.21|Gen 3:21]] + 2 t., <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּתְנֹת‎</span> [[Ezra.2.69|Ezra 2:69]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֻּתֳּנֹתָם‎</span> [[Lev.10.5|Lev 10:5]] — ***tunic***, principal ordinary garment (see [[BDB#Benz|Benz]]<sup>Archaeology 98 f.</sup> [[BDB#Now|Now]]<sup>Archaeology i, 121, 193</sup>) of man and woman, worn next the person, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּתְנֹת עוֺר‎</span> [[Gen.3.21|Gen 3:21]] ***tunics of skin***; of man [[2Sam.15.32|2Sam 15:32]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פִּי כ‎</span> [[Job.30.18|Job 30:18]] ***mouth of any tunic*** (i.e. its collar); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פַּסִּים‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כ‎</span> [[Gen.37.3|Gen 37:3]]; [[Gen.37.23|Gen 37:23]]; [[Gen.37.32|Gen 37:32]] i.e. tunic with long skirts and sleeves (see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פַּס‎</span>), compare v[[Gen.37.23|Gen 37:23]] v[[Gen.37.31|Gen 37:31]] v[[Gen.37.31|Gen 37:31]] v[[Gen.37.32|Gen 37:32]] v[[Gen.37.33|Gen 37:33]] of woman [[Song.5.3|Song 5:3]] (put off at night); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פַּסִּים‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כ‎</span> [[2Sam.13.18|2Sam 13:18]]; [[2Sam.13.19|2Sam 13:19]] (of king's daughter; rent, as sign of grief, compare also [[2Sam.15.32|2Sam 15:32]], and see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קרע‎</span>). Specifically of priest's tunic [[Exod.28.4|Exod 28:4]]; [[Exod.28.39|Exod 28:39]] (embroidered, see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁבץ‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּשְׁבֵּץ‎</span>), v[[Exod.28.40|Exod 28:40]]; [[Exod.29.5|Exod 29:5]]; [[Exod.29.8|Exod 29:8]]; [[Exod.39.27|Exod 39:27]] (made of  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֵׁשׁ‎</span>, q. v.), [[Exod.40.14|Exod 40:14]]; [[Lev.8.7|Lev 8:7]]; [[Lev.8.13|Lev 8:13]]; [[Lev.10.5|Lev 10:5]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּֿד קֹדֶשׁ‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כּ‎</span> [[Lev.16.4|Lev 16:4]] ***a holy linen tunic***, of high priest; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֹּֿהֲנִים‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כ‎</span> [[Ezra.2.69|Ezra 2:69]]; [[Neh.7.69|Neh 7:69]]; [[Neh.7.71|Neh 7:71]] ([[BDB#van d.H.|van d. H.]] v[[Neh.7.70|Neh 7:70]] v[[Neh.7.72|Neh 7:72]]); of Shebna's official tunic [[Isa.22.21|Isa 22:21]].
